Draft Rating:

C

Gar Forman ranks in the 52th percentile for drafting among executives in our database. Forman's draft picks average out to be worth the equivalent of 2 spots lower than they were picked due to their terrible drafting.
Some of their biggest wins:
  • Drafted Jimmy Butler with 30th pick but was worth 2th pick.
  • Drafted Cameron Bairstow with 49th pick but was worth 17th pick.
  • Drafted James Johnson with 16th pick but was worth 14th pick.
Some of their biggest busts:
  • Drafted Tony Snell with 20th pick but was worth 50th pick.
  • Drafted Coby White with 7th pick but was worth 56th pick.
  • Drafted Taj Gibson with 26th pick but was worth 47th pick.

Trade Rating:

B-

Gar Forman ranks in the 66th percentile for trading among executives in our database.
Their biggest win:
  • Added Vladimir Veremeenko to CHI.
  • Lost Kirk Hinrich, Kevin Séraphin to WAS.
Their biggest L:
  • Added Kris Dunn, Zach LaVine, Lauri Markkanen to CHI.
  • Lost Jimmy Butler, Justin Patton to MIN.

Signing Rating:

A-

Gar Forman ranks in the 80th percentile for free agency signings among executives in our database.
Their best signings:
  • Signed Zach LaVine in 2018.
  • Signed Pau Gasol in 2014.
  • Signed Nikola Mirotić in 2014.
Their worst signings:
  • Signed Kirk Hinrich in 2012.
  • Signed Doug McDermott in 2014.
  • Signed Cristiano Felício in 2017.
